question: Which country hosts the annual celebration of "Rock am Ring and Rock im Park" festivals?
explanation: Germany hosts the annual celebration of "Rock am Ring and Rock im Park" festivals. The Rock am Ring and Rock im Park festivals, of music genres such as alternative rock; heavy metal; punk rock; electronic, are two simultaneous rock music festivals held annually. While Rock am Ring takes place at the Nurburgring race track, Rock im Park takes place at the Zeppelinfeld in Nurnberg. Both festivals are usually regarded as one event with a mostly identical lineup for both festivals. All artists perform one day at the Nurburgring and another day in Nurnberg during the three-day event. Combined, Rock im Park and Rock am Ring are the largest music festivals held in Germany and one of the largest in the world.
